description: Lusamine`s Clefairy was talked about by Lillie and her mother Lusamine in an argument. Lillie wanted to raise it without evolving it because she preferred it that way as it was cuter than Lusamine`s Clefable. Lusamine evolved it into a Clefable because it was her Pok√©mon and not Lillie`s.
name: Pippi (Lusamine)
